parameters.name: AclUuidList
parameters.description: The UUIDs of access control policies.

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The direction of the traffic to which the access control policy applies. Valid values:

*   **out**: outbound traffic

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: NatGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the NAT gateway.
